summary: From my own standpoint I really think mew should have been the detective pokemon instead of pikachu (spoilers under cut)[[MORE]]...
body:
From my own standpoint I really think mew should have been the detective pokemon instead of pikachu

(spoilers under cut)

It would make more sense for mew to be going along side tim instead of pikachu. Even though I know it’s supposed to be pikachu because it was harry’s partner pokemon (and pikachu is tim’s dad. that needs to be clarified) but I think it would make more sense with more dramatics for mew to be going with tim. Pikachu is seen being pretty fast both bipedal and quadrupedal, while mew only ever floats, and if Mew had amnesia like pikachu, it would make more sense for it to be slow because it would have to get used to walking on its giant feet. The main reason harry could have gotten in a car crash after being sabotaged is because someone learned he had mew on hand and was protecting it so to get harry out of the way they crashed his car, not knowing he had mew WITH him at the time of the incident. Mew’s psychic link with Harry would also make it possible for it to know that harry was still alive, or at least transferred harry’s thoughts to itself before being found by mewtwo.

It would also make more sense for mewtwo to put the promise on mew, because not only is mew their original, mew is also more capable of taking own a large circulation of their cells. Especially if mew was well known with a detective agency where they could gather information to find harry and help tim

It would also make more sense, because unlike mewtwo, if mew could remember to use moves, mew could use and learn any type move despite being a psychic type and can transform and turn invisible. It makes it more likely or mewtwo to trust in it’s original instead of some random pikachu crawling away from a car crash wreckage

I’m just rlly salty that mew isn’t the detective and pikachu is simply because pikachu is the face of pokemon

summary: One thing from the Detective Pikachu trailers that surprised me was learning that the Ludicolo line is mammalian
body:
One thing from the Detective Pikachu trailers that surprised me was learning that the Ludicolo line is mammalian

It’s so much more obvious now that that is fur and they’re based on platypuses and not ducks. Still half plant but this was news to me.

reblog.comment:
One thing from the Detective Pikachu trailers that surprised me was learning that the Ludicolo line is mammalian

It’s so much more obvious now that that is fur and they’re based on platypuses and not ducks. Still half plant but this was news to me.

summary: Joltik are everywhere in the Detective Pikachu trailer and I’m living for it Whoever made the decision to have them there...
body:
Joltik are everywhere in the Detective Pikachu trailer and I’m living for it

Whoever made the decision to have them there deserves an award and will be promoted to Saint of the Joltik qwq

I really, REALLY hope we get to see Galvantula a la Aragog, where they follow all the widdle baby Joltik to big daddy Galvantula qwq

summary:
Detective pikachu- excuse miss, we'd like to ask you some questions.
Gardevoir- well hello cutie, you want to have some...
caption:
Detective pikachu- excuse miss, we’d like to ask you some questions.
Gardevoir- well hello cutie, you want to have some fun?
Pikachu- whoa, yea
Tim- what is she saying pikachu?
Pikachu- uhhh, it a complicated pokemon thing. You should look around for clues well i question this suspect behind those bushes for about a hour.
